channel.title: [PI] Magic Logs not appearing?
channel.description:
Hello, I am having trouble with the magic logs not appearing in game. What I mean is that their sprites are not showing in-game. [URL=http://img84.imageshack.us/i/47625163.png/][IMG]http://img84.imageshack.us/img84/8837/47625163.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]
They work just like any magic log should, but their sprite doesn't appear. Not even on the noted magic logs either. I would be very grateful if someone could shed some light on this problem.
Thanks.

item.title: [PI] Magic Logs not appearing?
item.dc:creator: @Palagerini Palagerini
item.description:
@Palagerini wrote:

Thank you for the replies. . I found a model and put it in the client already, and found a code:

if (i == 1513) { itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = null; itemDef.name = "Magic logs"; itemDef.description = "Logs cut from a magic tree.".getBytes(); itemDef.modelID = 26902; itemDef.modelZoom = 1180; itemDef.modelRotation1 = 120; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 1852; itemDef.anInt204 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset2 = -7; itemDef.maleEquip1 = -1; itemDef.femaleEquip1 = -1; itemDef.anInt188 = -1; itemDef.anInt164 = -1; itemDef.anInt175 = -1; itemDef.anInt197 = -1; }

but where exactly do I put the code in ItemDef? Under which method exactly? Thank you.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Magic Logs not appearing?
item.dc:creator: @Xx_Weed_Xx Xx Weed Xx
item.description:
@Xx_Weed_Xx wrote:

You need the model.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Magic Logs not appearing?
item.dc:creator: @maxsuxx maxsuxx
item.description:
@maxsuxx wrote:

This is a big problem with PI often the clients missing the model so you have to look for it at the forum if some 1 have upload the model, Private Messange me if you need help…

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Magic Logs not appearing?
item.dc:creator: @Canownueazy Canownueazy
item.description:
@Canownueazy wrote:

Check your client and see if it’s trying to override the magic logs item with something else? (Failed custom item?)

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Magic Logs not appearing?
item.dc:creator: @Palagerini Palagerini
item.description:
@Palagerini wrote:

Hello, I am having trouble with the magic logs not appearing in game. What I mean is that their sprites are not showing in-game.

Uploaded with ImageShack.us

They work just like any magic log should, but their sprite doesn’t appear. Not even on the noted magic logs either. I would be very grateful if someone could shed some light on this problem.

Thanks.
